name: Rhythm Freaks (Rhythm jam prototype)
description:
U got a blacklist to erase, but u are the  #25!!!!

Beat the blacklist #24 and get her confidence!!

This game isn't finished yet, cuz the latest one got corrupted....

WASD/Arrows as controls(XBOX gamepad support too!!)

Like DDR but very hard!!!

Ah, if you die you will be corrupted OWO!!!
